isis.stitle: DT-466E and 530E Diesel Engine Diagnostics Model Years 1999-2000 - DIAGNOSTIC TOOLS - TOOLS - GAUGE BAR TOOL (PS94-831-3)

svcsubproc.title: Description
svcsubproc.para: The Gauge Bar Tool can be used to measure intake manifold (Boost) pressure, fuel pressure, air cleaner intake restriction, fuel restriction, exhaust, and crankcase pressure.
Gauge (1), 0-30 psi gauge can be used to measure intake manifold (boost) pressure.
Gauge (2) (compound) (0-30 in Hg vacuum) and (0-30 psi) can be used to measure fuel system inlet restriction, fuel pressure, or intake manifold (boost) pressure.
The 0-60 in H 2O (magnehelic) gauge (0-2.16 psi) can be used to measure air cleaner restriction or crankcase pressure.

note.para: When using the magnehelic gauge, be sure to plug the test line into the proper vacuum port (3) or pressure port (4).

svcsubproc.para: Gauge (5), 0-100 psi gauge can be used to check fuel pressure.
Gauge (6), 0-30 psi gauge with a built in regulator can be used to check waste gate actuator movement.

svcsubproc.title: Operating Instructions
svcsubproc.para: Connect test lines between the gauge ports on the Gauge Bar and the test points shown on the (rear side) of Hard start / No Start and Performance Diagnostic form EGED-180-2.
